title: Word Portrait
subtitle: A generative art experiment that constructs portraits using only typography.

sections.heading: What You Get
sections.body: This experiment explores the intersection of semantic meaning and visual representation. By uploading an image and providing a set of words, the algorithm reconstructs the visual data using text density and color.

sections.heading: How to Use
sections.body:
1. Upload a portrait image.
2. Enter a list of words or a paragraph of text.
3. Adjust density and size controls.
4. Click 'Generate' to see the result.
